name: Introduction to Python Programming
description: Learn the fundamentals of Python programming, including data types, control structures, functions, and more.

lessons.name: Introduction to Python
lessons.description: Learn about the history of Python and its uses.

lessons.name: Data Types
lessons.description: Explore the different data types in Python.

lessons.name: Control Structures
lessons.description: Understand control structures like loops and conditionals.

lessons.name: Functions
lessons.description: Learn how to define and call functions in Python.

name: Web Development Bootcamp
description: Master the basics of web development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

lessons.name: HTML Basics
lessons.description: Learn the structure of web pages using HTML.

lessons.name: CSS Fundamentals
lessons.description: Style your web pages with CSS.

lessons.name: JavaScript Introduction
lessons.description: Add interactivity to your web pages with JavaScript.

lessons.name: Building a Website
lessons.description: Create a complete website from scratch.

name: Data Science Essentials
description: Learn data analysis, visualization, and machine learning using Python.

lessons.name: Data Analysis with Pandas
lessons.description: Use Pandas for data manipulation and analysis.

lessons.name: Data Visualization with Matplotlib
lessons.description: Create insightful visualizations using Matplotlib.

lessons.name: Introduction to Machine Learning
lessons.description: Understand the basics of machine learning.

lessons.name: Project: Data Science Case Study
lessons.description: Apply your knowledge in a real-world data science project.

name: Mobile App Development with Flutter
description: Build beautiful and high-performing mobile apps for iOS and Android using Flutter.

lessons.name: Getting Started with Flutter
lessons.description: Install Flutter and set up your development environment.

lessons.name: Building User Interfaces
lessons.description: Design beautiful UIs with Flutter widgets.

lessons.name: State Management
lessons.description: Manage the state of your applications.

lessons.name: Publishing Your App
lessons.description: Learn how to publish your app to app stores.

name: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
description: Understand the principles of cybersecurity and learn how to protect information systems.

lessons.name: Introduction to Cybersecurity
lessons.description: Learn about the importance of cybersecurity.

lessons.name: Network Security Basics
lessons.description: Understand the fundamentals of network security.

lessons.name: Cryptography Essentials
lessons.description: Learn about encryption and decryption methods.

lessons.name: Threat Analysis
lessons.description: Analyze potential threats and vulnerabilities.

name: Digital Marketing Strategies
description: Explore the latest digital marketing techniques and tools to enhance your business.

lessons.name: SEO Fundamentals
lessons.description: Learn the basics of search engine optimization.

lessons.name: Social Media Marketing
lessons.description: Utilize social media platforms for marketing.

lessons.name: Email Marketing Techniques
lessons.description: Discover effective email marketing strategies.

lessons.name: Analytics and Reporting
lessons.description: Learn how to measure and analyze marketing campaigns.

name: Game Development with Unity
description: Create engaging 2D and 3D games using the Unity game engine.

lessons.name: Introduction to Unity
lessons.description: Get familiar with the Unity interface and features.

lessons.name: 2D Game Development
lessons.description: Create a complete 2D game using Unity.

lessons.name: 3D Game Development
lessons.description: Learn how to build immersive 3D games.

lessons.name: Game Publishing
lessons.description: Understand the process of publishing your game.

name: Machine Learning A-Z
description: Learn how to create Machine Learning models using Python and R.

lessons.name: Introduction to Machine Learning
lessons.description: Understand the basics and applications of ML.

lessons.name: Supervised Learning
lessons.description: Learn about regression and classification techniques.

lessons.name: Unsupervised Learning
lessons.description: Explore clustering and association algorithms.

lessons.name: Deep Learning Basics
lessons.description: Get introduced to deep learning concepts and models.

name: Cloud Computing Fundamentals
description: Discover the essentials of cloud computing and its applications in business.

lessons.name: Cloud Computing Basics
lessons.description: Understand the fundamental concepts of cloud computing.

lessons.name: Service Models
lessons.description: Explore different cloud service models like IaaS, PaaS, and SaaS.

lessons.name: Cloud Security
lessons.description: Learn about security considerations in cloud environments.

lessons.name: Building Cloud Applications
lessons.description: Learn to design and deploy applications on the cloud.
